examples.example: 周末的时候，我想和朋友们一起出去玩耍，享受美好时光。

translate.english: On the weekend, I want to go out and play with friends and enjoy the good time.

examples.example: 我准备出去欣赏美丽的自然风光。

translate.english: I am going to go out to appreciate the beautiful natural scenery.

examples.example: 阳光明媚的日子，我们应该出去走走，看看这多彩的世界。

translate.english: On sunny days, we should go out for a walk and see this colorful world.
